docs.snippet: A contest to select young composer's from Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay for scholarships at the Berkshire Music Center next summer will be sponsored by the Empire Tractor Corporation of New York and Philadelphia, it was announced yesterday.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Switzerland, Aug. 7 -- At least four different plans for a Palestine solution were presented J today to the United Nations' Palestine committee during two highly secret informal meetings, it was learned tonight.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Aug. 10 -- With tomorrow afternoon set as the deadline for submission of memoranda by members of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine on a possible political solution of the Palestine problem, two written propositions have...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Aug. 10 -- With tomorrow afternoon set as the deadline for submission of memoranda by members of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine on a possible political solution of the Palestine problem, two written propositions have already been circulated, one by the Yugoslav delegation and one by the Uruguayan delegation.
docs.abstract: UN com nears decisive action; 2 recommendations circulated among members

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 13 -- A fresh wave of uncertainty over the economic and political situation hit the stock markets here today. Foreign and domestic selling was heavy in the gilt-edge and industrial sections, and brokers found it difficult to deal in even...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 13 -- A fresh wave of uncertainty over the economic and political situation hit the stock markets here today. Foreign and domestic selling was heavy in the gilt-edge and industrial sections, and brokers found it difficult to deal in even small lines of shares as jobbers were widening and marking down quotations in an effort to avoid taking any more stock on their books.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; General Decline in Prices Is Caused by Uncertainties and Jobbers' Caution

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 14 -- After opening with every appearance of having another weak session, the stock markets here today turned steadier as gilt-edge securities rallied to close with net gains.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Unexpected Recovery Made, as Gilt-Edge and Cold-Mining Issues Advance

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 15 -- With the Government giving official support to the gilt-edge market, the stock markets here today were able to make a much better finish to the week than seemed possible at one time. Investors followed the lead and British...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 15 -- With the Government giving official support to the gilt-edge market, the stock markets here today were able to make a much better finish to the week than seemed possible at one time. Investors followed the lead and British Government stocks wound up with all-around gains of up to 1 1/2 points.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Gilt-Edge Stocks Advance With Government Support -- Industrial Issues Lag

docs.snippet: PETROPOLIS, Brazil, Aug. 16 -- As the Inter-American Defense Conference adjourned its formal sessions this afternoon until Monday, Mexico moved to defer the touchy economic questions to the Pan-American meeting at Bogota, Colombia, next January.
